wikipedia.title: Fructose
wikipedia.summary: Fructose, or fruit sugar, is a simple ketonic monosaccharide found in many plants, where it is often bonded to glucose to form the disaccharide sucrose.

wikipedia.title: Honey
wikipedia.summary: Honey gets its sweetness from the monosaccharides fructose and glucose, and has about the same relative sweetness as granulated sugar.

Sugar Myth - ‘Sugar Turns into Belly Fat!’
